root.name: Jaguar XJ220
root.description: For many gamers and game critics, Jaguar XJ220 was the pinnacle of the sprite-based "two-and-a-half-D" racing game. It built upon the core concepts that had made Gremlin's Lotus series so popular, and expanded the horizon with a few innovative features, like the track editor and the CD player-style interface for music selection.In addition to a solid driving model, the game was praised for its presentation, which was immaculate for the time. Detailed car sprites and environments, smooth animation, great music and some impressive weather effects all contributed to a memorable experience.
